meta.title: Data Solutions & Web Scraping Services — House of Agile • Switzerland • Germany
meta.description: Expert data extraction, web scraping, and analytics services for family offices and private clients in Switzerland and Germany. Python, Selenium, data processing, automation, and business intelligence.
meta.ogTitle: Data Solutions & Web Scraping — House of Agile
meta.ogDescription: Expert web scraping, data extraction, and analytics services. Python, Selenium, automated data collection, and business intelligence.

hero.title: Intelligent Data Extraction &
hero.description: Our expert collective delivers sophisticated web scraping, data extraction, and analytics solutions for family offices and private clients in Switzerland and Germany. From automated market research to competitive intelligence and business analytics.

webScraping.title: Web Scraping & Data Extraction
webScraping.description: Advanced web scraping solutions for extracting structured data from websites, APIs, and online sources. We handle complex JavaScript-heavy sites, anti-bot protection, and large-scale extraction.
features: Rate limiting and ethical scraping practices

dataAnalytics.title: Data Analytics & Processing
dataAnalytics.description: Transform raw data into actionable insights with sophisticated data processing and analytics pipelines. We handle data cleaning, transformation, and analysis at scale.

automation.title: Automated Data Collection
automation.description: Set up continuous automated data collection systems that run 24/7, monitoring sources, detecting changes, and alerting you to important updates.

competitiveIntelligence.title: Competitive Intelligence
competitiveIntelligence.description: Monitor competitors, track market trends, and gather intelligence from public sources. We create systems that continuously gather and analyze competitive data.

dataWarehousing.title: Data Warehousing & Storage
dataWarehousing.description: Design and implement data storage solutions optimized for your analysis needs. From SQL databases to big data solutions.

aiMl.title: AI & Machine Learning Integration
aiMl.description: Enhance data solutions with machine learning for pattern recognition, classification, and predictive analytics.

cta.title: Need Data Solutions?
cta.description: Schedule a confidential consultation to discuss your data extraction, scraping, and analytics needs.
